about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the chilling atmosphere of Slendrina Remake, where every minute is a fight for survival. This first-person horror game invites you into a sinister cellar filled with mysteries, puzzles, and spine-tingling moments.

Welcome to The Cellar

The game features a single but highly detailed location: the cellar. This maze of dark hallways and locked doors hides many secrets. Its oppressive atmosphere will keep you on edge from start to finish.

Collect Keys, Books, and Candles

Your salvation depends on finding crucial items. Keys unlock new areas, books and candles are essential for completing the ritual needed to banish Slendrina.

Solve Puzzles to Progress

The cellar presents various puzzles that block your access to critical items. These challenges will test your observation and logic, adding variety to your exploration.

Banish Slendrina

There are no battles here, but the tension remains until the very end. To banish Slendrina, you must collect all the required items and place them correctly within a pentagram. Only then can you complete this eerie ritual and escape the cellar.

Key Features

  • An engaging item collection system involving keys, books, and candles.

  • A tense atmosphere crafted through sound and lighting..

Can you find everything, uncover the cellar’s grim secrets, and complete the ritual to banish Slendrina? Test your courage in Slendrina Remake—if you dare.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For a successful game launch, components with lower performance may be required

short_description: Slendrina Remake is a scary survival game set in a dungeon where you must gather items, solve puzzles, and evade the sinister Slendrina herself to make it out alive. Experience the atmosphere of fear and tension in this gripping horror adventure.
